item.title: footnotes
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: This page is about the WordPress plugin footnotesIt has been under development since 19 March 2014. footnotes aims to be the all-in-one solution for displaying an automatically generated list of references on your Page or Post. The Plugin ships with a set of defaults while also empowering you to control how your footnotes are being displayed. footnotes gives you the ability to display well-formatted footnotes on your WordPress Pages and Posts â€” those footnotes we know from offline publishing.
